mapper.select: select ta.id, tu1.name as ownerName, ta.name, ta.start_time, ta.end_time, ta.cost, ta.description, ta.create_time, tu2.name as createName, ta.edit_time, tu3.name as editName from t_activity as ta left outer join t_user as tu1 on ta.owner_id = tu1.id left outer join t_user as tu2 on ta.create_by = tu2.id left outer join t_user as tu3 on ta.edit_by = tu3.id where ta.id = #{id}
